organic_results.title: Public and private schools revisited
organic_results.snippet: Our dismay at the quality of Coleman, Hof-fer and Kilgore's rejoinder to our critique of their study compels us to respond. We do so to restore our scientific credibility to readers of this journal, and to provide guidance for those who share our concern that quantitative methods be used competently and responsibly in social science. Our critique (Goldberger and Cain, 1982; henceforth GC) focused on two reports by Coleman, Hoffer and Kilgore (henceforth CHK): 1981a (henceforth DR) and 1982a (henceforth SEI). CHK's rejoinder was con-tained …
